item.description:
Lisa Kennally is the owner and founder of lisa ann skincare in Madison, Ct. In 2005 Lisa launched her skincare line based on products sourced globally for their antioxidant and nourishing benefits. Lisa specializes in designing products for day spas and their treatments. Currently Lisa is the primary products supplier for the seasonal treatment offerings at the famed Norwich Inn & Spa. She has shipped products globally (from England to New Zealand).

 

AT our meeting Lisa will share with us: 

  • An overview of her business including how she got started and more
  • How she was able to get her product featured in a major international magazine in August.
  • Why she recently hired a business coach.
  • How she uses social media--a great tie-in to our planned topic for October

Lisa will also do a short demonstration on how you can make an at home facial mask and facial exfoliator.

Everyone will be able to take home a sample!

Those who attended Lisa's previous talk for AWBL are still raving about the lip balm!
item.name: Reconnect with AWBL and enjoy speaker Lisa Kennally
